divs: sighting detailsi was outside having a cigarette at a little after 10pm tues.(4\20\09). i was looking at all the stars and notice a light west of me that was pulsating different colors red,blue,green,yellow, and white. a couple of friends were also over so i told them to check it out. my friend and i look at this light for about 20 minutes waiting to see if it was a plane or a chopper. it definately caught our attention. it stayed stationary making small jogs left to right and then it moved in a circular motion counter clockwise, thats when i knew something weird was happening. it also look like it had a spotlight but it only went down a little bit in comparison to the size of the object. it could have just been the brightness of the object, but i really don't think so it was defined. that's about it we went inside i kept looking outside to see if it was there and it was. i believe it was 11:30pm when i last look out to see if i could see it and it was gone.
Summary: Stationary object pulsating red, green, yellow, blue lights in the sky.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Yakima
There were no other sightings in Yakima on or around April 20th 2009
